trans-unit.source: Manages serialization plug-ins created, using <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref>, by manufacturers who have their own proprietary serialization formats.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce i plug-in serializzazione creato, utilizzando <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref>, dai produttori che hanno formati di serializzazione proprietari.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Solo i chiamanti completamente attendibili possono creare un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an object derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> class for the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> that will use the specified descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un oggetto derivato dalla classe astratta <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref> classe per l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.IO.Stream>che utilizzerà il descrittore specificato.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted applications can call CreateSerializerWriter.
trans-unit.target: Solo le applicazioni completamente attendibili possono chiamare CreateSerializerWriter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> that contains serialization information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> che contiene informazioni di serializzazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> to which the returned object writes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Stream>in cui scrive l'oggetto restituito.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An object of a class derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto di una classe derivata da <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters is null.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei parametri è null.

trans-unit.source: The serializerDescriptor is specifying the wrong version.
trans-unit.target: Il serializerDescriptor specifica la versione errata.

trans-unit.source: -or- It is not registered.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - non è registrato.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assembly file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - Impossibile trovare il file di assembly.

trans-unit.source: -or- The assembly cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - l'assembly non può essere caricato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di serializzatori di plug-in installati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> objects already registered.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> del <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> oggetti già registrati.

trans-unit.source: Registers a serializer plug-in.
trans-unit.target: Registra un serializzatore plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente solo i chiamanti completamente attendibili.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret an already registered plug-in as the same one if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo interpreterà un già registrati plug-in come lo stesso se ha lo stesso in tutte queste proprietà: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> per il plug-in.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to overwrite an existing registration for the same plug-in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per sovrascrivere una registrazione esistente per lo stesso plug-in; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la sezione Osservazioni.

trans-unit.source: serializerDescriptor is null.
trans-unit.target: serializerDescriptorè null.

trans-unit.source: overwrite is and the plug-in is already registered.
trans-unit.target: overwriteè e il plug-in è già registrato.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a serializer plug-in from the registry.
trans-unit.target: Elimina un serializzatore plug-in dal Registro di sistema.

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente solo i chiamanti completamente attendibili.

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret a registered plug-in as the same one passed to this method only if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo interpreterà un plug-in stesso passato a questo metodo solo se ha lo stesso in tutte queste proprietà: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"> </xref> per il plug-in.

trans-unit.source: serializerDescriptor is null.
trans-unit.target: serializerDescriptorè null.

trans-unit.source: The plug-in is not registered.
trans-unit.target: Il plug-in non è registrato.

trans-unit.source: See **Remarks**.
trans-unit.target: Vedere **osservazioni**.
